Question: Barrett -- Advanced Robotics CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Barrett

Advanced Robotics CES 2024

- Motion Pillow uses AI to tackle snoring, with airbag inflation and sleep data tracking. It also includes an accompanying Motion Ring for real-time sleep monitoring. Available for $420 during CES.

- Bmind Smart Mirror, the world's first AI-powered smart mirror for mental wellness, provides personalized recommendations and mental state-based interventions. Recognized as a CES 2024 Innovation Award Honoree in the Smart Home category.

- Minitailz Smart Dog Collar, a fitness tracker for dogs, detects GPS location, health stats, and offers AI-driven activity detection. Recognized as a CES 2024 Innovation Award Honoree in the Artificial Intelligence category, available for $99 with a subscription fee.

- Yarbo Multi-Purpose Intelligent Yard Robot, a modular outdoor robot system for yard maintenance tasks, including snow blowing, lawn mowing, and more. Available for purchase online.

- Wim, an innovative walking and exercise assistance device with personalized AI coaching, recognized as a CES 2024 Innovation Awards Honoree in the Accessibility & Aging Tech, Robotics category. Sales begin in February.

- Holobox, a hologram communication device for real-time communication, available as a "plug and play" system, with a desktop version called the Holobox Mini. Pricing information available upon request.
